title: AI Bot for Website: Increase Conversion and Automate Communication
hero.title: Increase Website Conversion with an AI Bot
hero.subtitle: Automate customer communication 24/7 in one step! You can also integrate AI into your website for customer interaction, just contact us.
benefits.title: Why Our AI Bot?
benefits.item1.title: Works 24/7
benefits.item1.text: The AI Bot from BUNKER-255-AI answers customers even at night and on weekends.
benefits.item2.title: Reduces Load
benefits.item2.text: The AI Bot from BUNKER-255-AI frees up your employees from routine questions.
benefits.item3.title: Increases Sales
benefits.item3.text: The AI Bot from BUNKER-255-AI quickly answers questions and helps place orders.
howItWorks.title: How Does It Work?
howItWorks.step1.title: Step 1: Request
howItWorks.step1.text: Just message us on WhatsApp, and we'll schedule a meeting at our office to discuss your tasks. Nothing more is required from you; we handle the rest.
howItWorks.step2.title: Step 2: Setup
howItWorks.step2.text: We train the AI on data about you and your business that we receive from you. It's a labor-intensive process, but all you need to do is drink coffee while we work.
howItWorks.step3.title: Step 3: Launch
howItWorks.step3.text: We integrate the bot into your website, and it starts working. This is the most crucial moment, where our acquaintance usually just begins! After all, a very long road into the world of automation and AI awaits us.
pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.plan1.name: Start
pricing.plan2.name: Business
pricing.plan3.name: Enterprise
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.item1.question: How quickly can the bot be launched?
faq.item1.answer: Usually, the launch takes from three to 72 hours. It heavily depends on the complexity of the required algorithm.
faq.item2.question: Is technical knowledge required for setup?
faq.item2.answer: No, we will set everything up for you. You only need to provide information about your business.
faq.item3.question: What platforms does the bot work on?
faq.item3.answer: Our bot easily integrates with most popular CMS, code projects, and website builders as it is written in pure HTML+CSS.
faq.item4.question: What if the bot cannot answer a question?
faq.item4.answer: The bot can be configured to forward complex questions to your employee or collect contact details for follow-up.
cta.title: Ready to Improve Your Website?
cta.subtitle: Contact us right now to discuss how an AI bot can help your business.

meta.description: Increase website conversion with our AI bot. Automate customer communication 24/7, reduce employee workload, and boost sales.
